items.title: The death of 'soul of South African storytelling' sparks grief and anger
items.description: Actress Nandi Nyembe's final months were marked by money problems that threatened to overshadow her career.

items.title: Protesters and police clash after death of taxi driver in Indonesia
items.description: Tear gas and water cannons are used on protesters as demonstrations erupt across the country.

items.title: Barrier being built around besieged Sudan city, satellite images show
items.description: The earthen berm is intended to trap people inside el-Fasher, Yale University research shows.

items.title: US court rules many of Trump's global tariffs are illegal
items.description: The tariffs can remain in place until mid-October to allow the Trump administration time to request the Supreme Court take up the case.

items.title: Trump's rebuke, Xi's handshake, Putin's oil: India's foreign policy test
items.description: Indiaâ€™s foreign policy sits uneasily in the Trump-led order, caught between Russia and strained US relations.
